customBlockData.display:message:
%%[ 
SET @FirstName = [FirstName] 
SET @LastName = [LastName]

IF NOT EMPTY(@FirstName) THEN 
 SET @Salutation = @FirstName 
ELSEIF NOT EMPTY(@LastName) THEN 
 SET @Salutation = @LastName 
ENDIF 

SET @KeyDefaultAmount = "300,160,80"
SET @UpgradeAmount = 160
SET @Campaign__c = "7012u000000ITpeAAG"   /* Upgrade - New Donor Upgrade - SMS- 2024 - HK*/
SET @TimeNow = Now()
SET @TimeLocalised = SystemDateToLocalDate(@TimeNow)
SET @MessageSendDate = Format(@TimeLocalised,"yyyy-MM-dd")
SET @Credit_Card_Number_Last_Four__c = Lookup("ENT.Recurring_Donation__c_Salesforce_1","Credit_Card_Number_Last_Four__c","Id", @Recurring_Donation__c)

SET @url = CloudPagesURL(611,
        'MessageSendDate',@MessageSendDate,
        'Campaign__c',@Campaign__c,
        'UpgradeAmount',@UpgradeAmount,
        'KeyDefaultAmount',@KeyDefaultAmount,
        "utm_source", "sfmc_new_donor_upg",
        "utm_medium", "sms",
        "utm_campaign", "supporter_services",
        "utm_content", "sfmc_new_donor_upg")

SET @LongUrl = Concat(@url,'&campaignId=',@Campaign__c,'&UpgradeAmount=', @UpgradeAmount, '&suggestedAmount=', @suggestedAmount,'&keyDefaultAmount=', @keyDefaultAmount)

SET @payload = Concat('{"long_url":"', @LongUrl, '"}')
SET @token = 'Bearer 564fcda7fd2a25879e7ef7d2fde63f68911b2ebe'
SET @status = HTTPPost("https://api-ssl.bitly.com/v4/shorten","application/json", @payload, @response, "Authorization", @token)
SET @bitlyUrl = Substring(@response, Add(IndexOf(@response,'"id":"'),6), 14)
SET @toURL = Concat("https://",@bitlyUrl)

]%%【Greenpeace】Hey %%=v(@Salutation)=%%, we are calling on behalf of the earth, and YOUR answer is the key. Seize the chance to change the world.  %%=v(@toURL)=%%

%%[ 
SET @FirstName = [FirstName] 
SET @LastName = [LastName]

IF NOT EMPTY(@FirstName) THEN 
 SET @Salutation = @FirstName 
ELSEIF NOT EMPTY(@LastName) THEN 
 SET @Salutation = @LastName 
ENDIF 

SET @KeyDefaultAmount = "300,160,80"
SET @UpgradeAmount = 160
SET @Campaign__c = "7012u000000ITpeAAG"   /* Upgrade - New Donor Upgrade - SMS- 2024 - HK*/
SET @TimeNow = Now()
SET @TimeLocalised = SystemDateToLocalDate(@TimeNow)
SET @MessageSendDate = Format(@TimeLocalised,"yyyy-MM-dd")
SET @Credit_Card_Number_Last_Four__c = Lookup("ENT.Recurring_Donation__c_Salesforce_1","Credit_Card_Number_Last_Four__c","Id", @Recurring_Donation__c)

SET @url = CloudPagesURL(611,
        'MessageSendDate',@MessageSendDate,
        'Campaign__c',@Campaign__c,
        'UpgradeAmount',@UpgradeAmount,
        'KeyDefaultAmount',@KeyDefaultAmount,
        "utm_source", "sfmc_new_donor_upg",
        "utm_medium", "sms",
        "utm_campaign", "supporter_services",
        "utm_content", "sfmc_new_donor_upg")

SET @LongUrl = Concat(@url,'&campaignId=',@Campaign__c,'&UpgradeAmount=', @UpgradeAmount, '&suggestedAmount=', @suggestedAmount,'&keyDefaultAmount=', @keyDefaultAmount)

SET @payload = Concat('{"long_url":"', @LongUrl, '"}')
SET @token = 'Bearer 564fcda7fd2a25879e7ef7d2fde63f68911b2ebe'
SET @status = HTTPPost("https://api-ssl.bitly.com/v4/shorten","application/json", @payload, @response, "Authorization", @token)
SET @bitlyUrl = Substring(@response, Add(IndexOf(@response,'"id":"'),6), 14)
SET @toURL = Concat("https://",@bitlyUrl)

]%%【綠色和平】%%=v(@Salutation)=%%，地球上的一切生物和人類的命運緊密相連，可是世界上約有 100 萬種動植物將瀕臨滅絕😨 一杯飲料價錢可以做啲咩？%%=v(@toURL)=%%
